channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Bryce McGowens Flourishing Freshman Season
item.description: Bryce Mcgowens is the only five star recruit Nebraska has ever had in their basketball program. Even though Nebraska’s season did not go so well, McGowens proved what made him a five star recruit with his natural scoring ability. Let’s look at where McGowens ranked among other Big Ten freshmen in total points scored throughout the whole season. ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.

item.title: Steph Curry's Everlasting Playstyle
item.description: ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.6 ✓ dplyr 1.0.8 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.4 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.1.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() This blog post is about how the three-pointer has changed the way basketball is played forever.

item.title: About Kaden Ross
item.description: Kaden Ross is a junior at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln with a major in Sports Media, and a minor in Business Administration. He was born in Omaha, Nebraska and wanted to stay close to home for college. Kaden is hoping to graduate in four years with a Bachelor’s degree in Sports Media/Communications and has a loving passion for basketball. He is also planning on getting an internship at the Hudl facility right here in downtown Lincoln.
